hardcore.explanation: Excludes the player loot table from randomization.
hardcore.warning: Using a seed with this flag will not generate the same loot tables as without it.

update.explanation: Attempts to create the datapack using pre-randomized loot-tables that you provide in the "randomized" folder.
update.warning: Using a seed with this flag will not generate the same loot tables as without it.

no-cheats.explanation: Excludes loot tables in "requires_cheats.json" from randomization.
no-cheats.warning: Using a seed with this flag will not generate the same loot tables as without it.

no-dead-ends.explanation: Excludes loot tables that drop nothing from randomization.
no-dead-ends.warning: Using a seed with this flag will not generate the same loot tables as without it.

save-seed.explanation: Includes the randomly generated seed in the datapack name and description.

hide-seed.explanation: Excludes your provided seed from the datapack name and description.
